-- | Prime natural numbers
--   
@package opentheory-prime
@version 1.82


module OpenTheory.Natural.Prime.Sieve
newtype Sieve
Sieve :: (Natural, [(Natural, (Natural, Natural))]) -> Sieve
unSieve :: Sieve -> (Natural, [(Natural, (Natural, Natural))])
initial :: Sieve
increment :: Sieve -> (Bool, Sieve)
perimeter :: Sieve -> Natural
next :: Sieve -> (Natural, Sieve)


module OpenTheory.Natural.Prime
primes :: [Natural]
